page.title: 09FOOD II
page.content: IAM A VEGETARIAN.THEREFORE IEAT LOTS OF DISHES MADE OF VEGETABLES,BEANS & NUTS. I MAKE A LOT OF CASSEROLES USING BEANS; BUTTERBEANS,GREEN,BORLOTTI & KIDNEY).I EAT NUT AND SOYA PROTEINS TOO.I HAVE TO EAT BROWN WHOLEMEAL BREAD AS OTHERWISE IWOULD LACK ROUGHAGE.IDRINK FRESH FRUIT JUICE AND EAT A LOT OF FRESH FRUIT.I HAVE TO WATCH SWEET THINGS AS WELL, AS ANIMAL FATS ARE OFTEN INCLUDED IN A LOT OF COMMERCIAL CAKES AND BISCUITS.I DONT EAT LARD OR SUET.AT XMAS THIS IS A TOIL SO BASICLY I OVERLOOK MINCE PIES & XMAS PUDDING.I DONT EAT FISH EITHER,BUT TUNA IS THE ONLY THING THAT WOULD EVER SWAY MY BELIEF IN VEGETARIANISM.I AM ONE OF A MILLION VEGES.IN BRITAIN, BUT IN MY FAMILY ONLY ME & MY SISTER ARE.WE BOTH ARE BECAUSE NEITHER OF US HAVE EVER LIKED MEAT AND WE,OR AT LEAST I THINK IT IS WRONG TO KILL ANIMALS FOR FOOD.
